TopicTitle: I think Squad or a modder should make a black hole in ksp to celebrate FINALLY seeing a black hole!!

Articles.Content:
The black hole would be super cool and if you crash into it.....

You could spaghettify or go into another dimension with wonky planets or something!

Mods god you covered already. 

And I will to in some more time

 

And the stock system would need much more love and care, than the need of creating an adition system

Edited April 12, 2019 by GrandProtectorDark
